net.cloud.gfx.elements

Class CenteredText

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.gfx.elements.AbstractElement
      • net.cloud.gfx.elements.Text
        • net.cloud.gfx.elements.CenteredText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Element, Focusable

    public class CenteredText
extends Text
    Simple text element which extends on the abilities of the plain Text label by centering the text within the drawing area of this element. The plain Text element normally draws with the top left of the text at the x,y coordinate. This places the text in the center both vertically and horizontally.

    • Method Detail

      • drawElement

        public void drawElement(java.awt.Graphics g,
                        int offsetX,
                        int offsetY)
                 throws IteratorException
        Description copied from class: Text
        Draw the text in the desired font and color at the position. The text will be drawn by the top left corner, rather than baseline.
        Specified by:
        drawElement in interface Element
        Overrides:
        drawElement in class Text
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics object to draw to
        offsetX - How far off on the X axis this element is from the Graphic's origin
        offsetY - How far off on the Y axis this element is from the Graphic's origin
        Throws:
        IteratorException - If there was an issue iterating child elements

      • updateGlyphVector

        protected void updateGlyphVector(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Update the glyph vector if need be, so the text is updated - via the superclass. This will also refresh the logical bounds of the text.
        Overrides:
        updateGlyphVector in class Text
        Parameters:
        g2d - The graphics object currently being used to draw with

      • updateTextMetrics

        protected void updateTextMetrics(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Calculate and assign the text height but not element height of this text label. This is necessary to draw in the right position, and must be done if the font or text changes. When this is called, action will only be taken if the update flag is set. The flag will be cleared.
        Overrides:
        updateTextMetrics in class Text
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics object this text is being drawn to
